lead_paragraph: An 18-year-old male was found shot near a McDonald’s in Flatbush, where the taped brawl took place this month, the police said. A baby girl was also shot minutes earlier in the same neighborhood.

headline.main: A Teenager Is Killed Near the Scene of a Brawl Caught on Video in Brooklyn

snippet: An 18-year-old male was found shot near a McDonald’s in Flatbush, where the taped brawl took place this month, the police said. A baby girl was also shot minutes earlier in the same neighborhood.
